snippet: Nearly 200 staff members at the Khmer Rouge tribunal, which is supported by the United Nations, have gone on strike to demand wages that are several months overdue.
abstract: Nearly 200 staff members at the Khmer Rouge tribunal in Cambodia, which is supported by the United Nations, have gone on strike to demand wages that are several months overdue.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 200 staff members at the Khmer Rouge tribunal, which is supported by the United Nations, have gone on strike to demand wages that are several months overdue.

headline.main: Cambodia: Workers at Khmer Rouge Tribunal Strike
